name: Heartstring Bugs
description:
Description: After having a disappointing first year of high school, Elly wants to open herself up to more people. A chance encounter with a baby virus grants her the ability to see the emotions of other people, which also gives her an extra boost of confidence. Raise Elly's stats and watch the events unfold in her last three years of high school!

This is a slice of life, high school dating sim where you raise your stats to trigger events.

More: This is the first dating sim made by me for fun back when I was learning. I am still making new games! Follow me on discord or social media for future games!

UPDATES: Octobter 2022: Version 1.2 released 

-Added ability to to speed up most animations with the skip active or ctrl key (the skip button on you keyboard)

-Fixed a few missing sprites

-V1.2 should work with newer versions of mac. If it does not, please try the older  version

-V1.2  may not work with your old saves. If you want to play your old saves,  please download the older version
